descriptionHtml:
Turn player's face to toward target. This MOD was another my mod option function.

This has 4 headtracking modes.
1: "HUD" -> Player is targeting only HUD object.
2: "HUD + Speaker" -> When player is targeting Object with HUD, ignore speaker.
3: "Speaker + HUD" -> When player is targeting spaeker, ignore HUD target object.
4: "Speaker" -> Only speaker.
This MOD can change player expression by the Object. And Player character expression synchronize to friendship actorexpression.
You can change expression type with MCM. If edit file(...\data\SKSE\Plugins\KNNHTPlugin.ini), you can aplly a custom expression to the player character.
Try another Headtracking MOD if you don't need expression.

Install :
Put "Data" folder.

Uninstall :
1. Open MCM
2. Disable "Enable Headtracking" toggle
3. Remove files

Required:
- [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE v1.7.3[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/]SkyUI v5.1[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44596/]MFG Console[/url](Because "Actor.ResetExpressionOverrides()" was not work my PC)
- Microsoft Visual C++ 2012 Redistributable (x86) has Installed on your PC.

SKSE team, SkyUI team, himika thank you great MOD and tools!
author: gekkou1992
